TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit ManagementScope extends System.Object implements class System.ICloneable

summary.span: 表示管理作業的範圍 (命名空間)。

span.span: Represents a scope (namespace) for management operations.

remarks.format: ## Examples 下列範例會初始化新與特定的路徑，然後連接到 WMI 命名空間的 範圍物件。The following example initializes a new with a specific path and then connects the scope object to a WMI namespace. 此範例會連接到遠端電腦上的命名空間。The example connects to a namespace on a remote computer. [!code-csharp[wminet_ManagementScope#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WindowsServer/wminet_ManagementScope/cs/ManagementScope.cs#1)] [!code-vb[wminet_ManagementScope#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WindowsServer/wminet_ManagementScope/vb/ManagementScope.vb#1)]

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class, with default values.
This is the default constructor.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果物件沒有任何連接之前設定的屬性，它會初始化使用預設值 （例如，在本機電腦和 root\cimv2 命名空間）。If the object does not have any properties set before connection, it is initialized with default values (for example, the local machine and the root\cimv2 namespace). ## .NET Framework 安全性.NET Framework Security 完全信任立即呼叫者。Full trust for the immediate caller. 這個成員無法供部分信任的程式碼使用。This member cannot be used by partially trusted code. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱[從部分信任程式碼使用程式庫](~/docs/framework/misc/using-libraries-from-partially-trusted-code.md)。For more information, see [Using Libraries from Partially Trusted Code](~/docs/framework/misc/using-libraries-from-partially-trusted-code.md).

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig instance void Connect() cil managed

summary.span: 將這個 連接至真實的 WMI 範圍。

span.span: Connects this to the actual WMI scope.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 範圍用於其連接要求的作業時，會隱含地呼叫這個方法。This method is called implicitly when the scope is used in an operation that requires it to be connected. 明確呼叫它可讓使用者控制連線的時間。Calling it explicitly allows the user to control the time of connection. 這個方法會傳回在兩分鐘內。This method will return within two minutes. ## .NET Framework 安全性.NET Framework Security 完全信任立即呼叫者。Full trust for the immediate caller. 這個成員無法供部分信任的程式碼使用。This member cannot be used by partially trusted code. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱[從部分信任程式碼使用程式庫](~/docs/framework/misc/using-libraries-from-partially-trusted-code.md)。For more information, see [Using Libraries from Partially Trusted Code](~/docs/framework/misc/using-libraries-from-partially-trusted-code.md). ## Examples 下列範例會初始化新與特定的路徑，然後連接到 WMI 命名空間的 範圍物件。The following example initializes a new with a specific path and then connects the scope object to a WMI namespace. 此範例會連接到遠端電腦上的命名空間。The example connects to a namespace on a remote computer. [!code-csharp[wminet_ManagementScope_Connect#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WindowsServer/wminet_ManagementScope_Connect/cs/ManagementScope_Connect.cs#1)] [!code-vb[wminet_ManagementScope_Connect#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WindowsServer/wminet_ManagementScope_Connect/vb/ManagementScope_Connect.vb#1)]

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property IsConnected As Boolean
public: property bool IsConnected { bool get(); };

summary.span: 取得值，指出 目前是否繫結至 WMI 伺服器和命名空間。

span.span: Gets a value indicating whether the is currently bound to a WMI server and namespace.

value.span: 傳回 值，指出該範圍目前是否繫結至 WMI 伺服器和命名空間。

span.span: Returns a value indicating whether the scope is currently bound to a WMI server and namespace.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 領域已中斷連線建立之後直到有人明確呼叫，或使用的任何作業，需要即時連接的範圍。A scope is disconnected after creation until someone explicitly calls , or uses the scope for any operation that requires a live connection. 此外，範圍已中斷連接從先前的連接時變更範圍的識別屬性。Also, the scope is disconnected from the previous connection whenever the identifying properties of the scope are changed. ## 屬性值Property Value `true` 如果連線運作 （繫結與伺服器和命名空間）。否則， `false`。`true` if a connection is alive (bound to a server and namespace); otherwise, `false`. ## .NET Framework 安全性.NET Framework Security 完全信任立即呼叫者。Full trust for the immediate caller. 這個成員無法供部分信任的程式碼使用。This member cannot be used by partially trusted code. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱[從部分信任程式碼使用程式庫](~/docs/framework/misc/using-libraries-from-partially-trusted-code.md)。For more information, see [Using Libraries from Partially Trusted Code](~/docs/framework/misc/using-libraries-from-partially-trusted-code.md).
